I recently come across on Play Market game "Bio Inc. Biomedical Plague" i think it's outrageous to make such games, is basically medical experiment simulator. And what do you think

Edited February 24, 2015 by Vanamonde
Snip

It is similar to plague inc. but just on a smaller scale an more specific. I think, from a glance without playing it, it has a lot of potential to teach people about how human bodies work, and the kind of diseases it may have. It may help people react better when they or someone they know got one of such disease, and report to medical professionals properly. May cause problems of amateur self-diagnosis, however.

But that is just my casual observation.

It's pretty informative, actually. I've tried playing it, and think that, aside from the somewhat macabre theme and annoying video ads, it's a decent way to pass the time.

Though, I have the feeling that it's meant more to educate the population than to entertain.
